titleStmt.title: A proclamation set fourth by the Quenes Maiestie, with the aduise of her moost honorable counsell, for the newe seuerall monies, and coines of fyne sterlynge syluer and golde, and the valuation of euery of the same, newe set furth by her heighnes
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1553-1558 : Mary I)
Mary I, Queen of England, 1516-1558.

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Iohannis Cawodi typographi Reginæ Maiestatis excusum,

notesStmt.note: "Geuen at our manor of Rychemonde, the xx. of August. In the fyrst yeare of our most prosperous reygne."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
